## Runtime.ResultResourceTree class

Implementation of a result-based resource tree that provides hierarchical access to resources. Extends ResultMap to provide collection-like access while adding tree-specific navigation methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ResultResourceTree<T> extends ResultMap<ResourceName, IReadOnlyResourceTreeNode> implements IReadOnlyResultResourceTree<T> 
```
**Extends:** ResultMap&lt;[ResourceName](./ts-res.resourcename.md)<!-- -->, [IReadOnlyResourceTreeNode](./ts-res.runtime.ireadonlyresourcetreenode.md)<!-- -->&gt;

**Implements:** [IReadOnlyResultResourceTree](./ts-res.runtime.ireadonlyresultresourcetree.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
